message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $180. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $160 for it.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $170.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Thank you for adjusting your price, Alice. I appreciate it. I am still looking for a better deal, but I am willing to pay $165 for the product.
